languages.text: "Он пребывал в перманентной агонии, но не был когнитивно дисфункционален. Желание немедленно ликвидировать объект, распознанный как греховный, отчасти продиктовано энграмматическими аугментами, получавшими императивы от боевой упряжи".

"Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed profane was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."
languages.original_text: "Он пребывал в перманентной агонии, но не был когнитивно дисфункционален. Желание немедленно ликвидировать объект, распознанный как греховный, отчасти продиктовано энграмматическими аугментами, получавшими императивы от боевой упряжи".

traits.locale_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed sinful was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed sinful was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed sinful was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed sinful was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed profane was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “尽管他长期处于痛苦状态，但他的认知功能并没有出现任何障碍。他迫切地想要立即摧毁一切他认为亵渎的东西。这样的愿望，一部分来源于他的记忆装置植入物，这些植入物会接受来自战斗装备的命令。”
languages.original_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed profane was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."

traits.locale_text: “尽管他长期处于痛苦状态，但他的认知功能并没有出现任何障碍。他迫切地想要立即摧毁一切他认为有罪的东西。这样的愿望，一部分来源于他的记忆装置植入物，这些植入物会接受来自战斗装备的命令。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Independientemente de su agonía permanente, no sufría disfunción cognitiva alguna. Sus deseos de destruir inmediatamente el objeto que consideraba blasfemo estaban dictados parcialmente por sus auméticos engramáticos, que recibían instrucciones de su arnés de combate».
languages.original_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed profane was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."

traits.locale_text: «Independientemente de su agonía permanente, no sufría disfunción cognitiva alguna. Sus deseos de destruir inmediatamente el objeto que consideraba pecaminoso estaban dictados parcialmente por sus auméticos engramáticos, que recibían instrucciones de su arnés de combate».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「永続的な苦悶の状態にかかわらず、彼は認知機能に障害はなかった。彼が冒涜的と判断した対象を直ちに破壊したいという欲求は、バトルハーネスから命令を受けていた彼のエングラム・オーグメティックによって、部分的に指示されていたようだ」
languages.original_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed profane was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."

traits.locale_text: 「永続的な苦悶の状態にかかわらず、彼は認知機能に障害はなかった。彼が冒涜的と判断した対象を直ちに破壊したいという欲求は、バトルハーネスから命令を受けていた彼のエングラム・オーグメティックによって、部分的に指示されていたようだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Er befand sich zwar in einem Zustand dauerhafter Qualen, war jedoch kognitiv nicht dysfunktional. Sein Verlangen, das in seinen Augen profane Objekt unverzüglich zu zerstören, wurde teilweise durch seine engrammatischen Augmentationen diktiert. Sie empfingen Befehle von seinem Kampfharnisch."
languages.original_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed profane was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."

traits.locale_text: "Er befand sich zwar in einem Zustand dauerhafter Qualen, war jedoch kognitiv nicht dysfunktional. Sein Verlangen, das in seinen Augen sündige Objekt unverzüglich zu zerstören, wurde teilweise durch seine engrammatischen Augmentationen diktiert. Sie empfingen Befehle von seinem Kampfharnisch."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Sans parler de sa souffrance permanente, il n'était pas fonctionnel sur le plan cognitif. Son désir de détruire immédiatement l'objet qu'il estimait profane venait en partie de ses augmétiques engrammatiques, qui recevaient les ordres de son harnais de combat. »
languages.original_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed profane was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."

traits.locale_text: « Sans parler de sa souffrance permanente, il n'était pas fonctionnel sur le plan cognitif. Son désir de détruire immédiatement l'objet qu'il estimait immoral venait en partie de ses augmétiques engrammatiques, qui recevaient les ordres de son harnais de combat. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed profane was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."

languages.text: "Kalıcı ızdırap içinde olma durumuna bağlı olarak bilişsel fonksiyon bozukluğundan muzdaripmiş. Din dışı olarak tanımladığı herhangi bir nesneyi anında yok etme arzusu, kısmen belleğindeki ogmentlerce dikte ediliyormuş. Onların emirleri de savaş teçhizatı kaynaklı."
languages.original_text: "Notwithstanding his permanent state of agony, he was not cognitively dysfunctional. His desire to immediately destroy the object he had deemed profane was partly dictated by his engrammatic augmetics, which were receiving imperatives from his battle harness."

traits.locale_text: "Kalıcı ızdırap içinde olma durumuna bağlı olarak bilişsel fonksiyon bozukluğuna sahipti. Din dışı olarak tanımladığı herhangi bir nesneyi anında yok etme arzusu, kısmen belleğindeki ogmentler tarafından dikte edilmekteydi, ki onlar da savaş teçhizatından emir alıyorlardı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
